items.title: Verdeya: A new chapter in addressing unmet needs with best-in-class cannabinoid products
items.description: We are proud to introduce a new name in health and wellbeing cannabinoid products. Verdeya.

items.title: Aspeya: A new name for science, insight, and innovation
items.description: March 4, 2025 Stamford, CT - March 4, 2025 - We are excited to announce that Vectura Fertin Pharma, Inc. has formally transitioned to a new corporate identity, Aspeya, Inc.
